testcase.description:
Pre-Condition: 1. Enable location configure
Test Procedure: 1. client connect with AP 2. enable location 3. turn on debug
testcase.stage:
get mac of sta1's sta1.tif.name
${bin.dir}/getrmtip.pl -d ${sta1.mif.ip} -u ${sta1.user} -p ${sta1.passwd} -i ${sta1.tif.name} -m -width
client connect with AP aerohive_abnormaltestcase_2_1-2.log
-v "ssid test0" -v "int w0 mode access" -v "int w0 ssid test0" -v "location aerohive enable" -v "location aerohive report-interval 15" -v "location aerohive rssi-update-threshold 1" -v "location aerohive rssi-valid-period 30" -v "location aerohive rssi-hold-time 10" -v "location aerohive mac ${sta1.tif.mac}"
STA up wifi interface
-v "ifconfig ${sta1.tif.name} down" -v "ifconfig ${sta1.tif.name} up"
get mac of sta1's sta1.tif.name
${bin.dir}/getrmtip.pl -d ${sta1.mif.ip} -u ${sta1.user} -p ${sta1.passwd} -i ${sta1.tif.name} -m -width
echo "conn1.ssid=test0" echo "conn1.proto=open" echo "conn1.pif=wifi0" echo "ssid_bind_interface=wifi0"
>
ifconfig to show the ip add aerohive_abnormaltestcase_2_2-4.log
-v "ifconfig ${sta1.tif.name}"
Get station's ip
perl ${bin.dir}/getrmtip.pl -f ${log.dir}/aerohive_abnormaltestcase_2_2-4.log -i ${sta1.tif.name} -nomask
Ping station aerohive_abnormaltestcase_2_2-6.log
-v "ping ${sta1_tif_ip} count 10"
-c -i " from " -i " ttl="
check RSSI reading base on CRC correctly aerohive_abnormaltestcase_2_3-1.log
-v "_df id 1 data src-mac ${sta1.tif.mac} interface wifi0" -v "_kdebug wifi-driver wifi0 recv" -v "_debug ltr all"
Check debug log aerohive_abnormaltestcase_2_3-2.log
-v "sh log bu | inc ltr"
-c -i "send msg to server"
